title: Functional Relations in Stokes Multipliers and Solvable Models related to U_q(A^{(1)}_n)
abstract: Recently, Dorey and Tateo have investigated functional relations among Stokes multipliers for a Schr{\"o}dinger equation (second order differential equation) with a polynomial potential term in view of solvable models. Here we extend their studies to a restricted case of n+1-th order linear differential equations.
